title: sundara mUruti
sahitya:
sundara mUruti mukhya prANa banda namma manege shrI rAma nAma dhvanige


caraNam 1    kaNakAlanduge gejje jhaNa jhaNarenuta jhaNaku jhaNakurendu kuNi kuNidADuta
    caraNam 2    tumburu nAradaru vINe pArisuta vINe pArisuta shrI rAma nAma pADuta
    caraNam 3    purandara viTTalana nenedu pADutali nenendu pADutali Alingana mADutali
